title: Distributed Execution with Cloud Workers

problem.en: Single-session agent execution cannot scale for team-wide AI code generation workloads.
problem.ko: 단일 세션 에이전트 실행은 팀 전체 AI 코드 생성 워크로드를 확장할 수 없습니다.

solution.en: Run multiple Claude sessions in parallel using git worktrees and cloud workers, coordinating via a central orchestrator.
solution.ko: git worktree와 클라우드 워커를 사용하여 여러 Claude 세션을 병렬로 실행하고, 중앙 오케스트레이터를 통해 조정합니다.

mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD
    A[Coordinator] --> B[Worker 1 + worktree]
    A --> C[Worker 2 + worktree]
    A --> D[Worker N + worktree]
    B --> E[Branch 1]
    C --> F[Branch 2]
    D --> G[Branch N]
    E & F & G --> H[Merge to Main]
code_example:
# Create isolated worktrees for each worker
for i in range(num_workers):
    worktree_path = f'/tmp/worktree-{i}'
    git.worktree.add(worktree_path, f'worker-branch-{i}')
    
    # Spawn cloud worker with isolated environment
    worker = cloud.spawn(
        image='claude-agent',
        mount=worktree_path
    )
    workers.append(worker)
